title: Carrying Out Of Gold
body:
Hey, can i have some recommendations for the easy champs to carry Mid and Jungle.
I play {{champion:1}}   sometimes but she gets boring and i need new champs i can easy carry with. 
And u could use some tips.
I would appreciate any response.

replies.body: Master yasuo and trust me it will be ez mode, every gold game I've played has has been a steam roll, just try to pick up some decent face roll champs like fizz katarina udyr Yi, I like tf at the moment because he can utilise the tp mid and create a lot of map pressure if used well

{{champion:69}}  is a relatively easy champ at the current time.
{{champion:103}}  is always a really easy champ that you don't need much time on her to utilize her well
{{champion:245}}  Super strong as an AP mid laner right now, and still a fairly decent tank top.

Carry top's tend to depend on your mechanics that you have mastered.
